name: CbcBranchingObject

algorithms.name:
Branch-and-Bound: Branching Action Interface
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcBranchingObject describes HOW to branch (the action):
- branch(): Execute next branch arm, modify solver bounds
- numberBranches(): Total arms (typically 2)
- way(): Current branch direction (+1 up, -1 down)

CbcBranchObjType enum identifies concrete types:
SimpleIntegerBranchObj, CliqueBranchObj, SoSBranchObj,
NWayBranchObj, CutBranchingObj, etc.

Extends OsiBranchingObject with CBC-specific features.

see: CbcObject for what creates branching objects

CbcIntegerBranchingObject for integer variable branching

Edwin 11/12/2009 carved from CbcBranchBase
